1.title: House of Blues
1.plot: The House of Blues is looking for a new Special Events Sales Manager. Four candidates vie for the position, but one of them is an undercover "insider" who already works at the company and is secretly spying on the others. When the candidates are challenged to throw a huge party on the Sunset Strip, chaos ensues and their best - and worst - sides are revealed. Three use the party to show off their sales skills, but one seems more interested in flirting with the crazy crowd.

2.title: Shoedazzle
2.plot: Four people compete for the exciting position of Director of Brand Marketing at the hip online shoe company Shoedazzle. But one of the candidates is the secret "insider," the undercover spy who already works for the company. And there's no telling how the candidates will react when one of them decides to throw another under the bus.

3.title: David Barton Gym
3.plot: David Barton Gym is the hippest gym in the country, and they're in need of a Director of Social Media. Of the four candidates for the job, one has the gym experience, one has the marketing background, one is super confident, and one is super sexy. But, there's an "insider" who already works for the company and is secretly spying on the others. Things get quite interesting when one of the candidates surprises everyone at a big event by exploiting the company slogan to "look better naked."

4.title: Abbyson Living
4.plot: Online furniture giant Abbyson Living has four candidates competing to be their new E-Commerce Brand Manager. But one of the four already works at the company and is secretly spying on the others. When the candidates are challenged to make a promotional film for the company website, it's an all-out battle to be the director.

5.title: Mazda
5.plot: International car company Mazda is looking for a new Launch Manger for their North American headquarters to coordinate the rollout of their redesigned Mazda3 for 2014. Four candidates compete for the job, but one of them is an undercover "insider" who already works for the company and is secretly spying on the others. When they're challenged to field questions from a room full of Mazda execs, one candidate will crash and burn but still hopes for a win in the end.

6.title: Johnny Rockets
6.plot: Johnny Rockets is expanding, and they need a new Field Marketing Manager to oversee 30 restaurants. Four candidates compete for the job, but one of them is an undercover "insider" who already works for the company and is secretly spying on the others. The candidates are thrown for a loop when they learn they must launch a new Johnny Rockets shake by performing a song and dance at one of their largest restaurants.

imdb.title: Inside Job
plot: A new series that puts executive job candidates through a unique screening process while being spied upon by a company insider.::Turner Network Television
